title: How to Quickly Max Out Emblems in Mobile Legends: Bang Bang

steps.headline: Open free chests every 4 hours.
steps.description: Free chests may contain magic dust and emblem fragments. They only stack up to two times so open them as they are ready.

steps.headline: Complete daily tasks to get the weekly activity chest.
steps.description: Weekly activity chests give emblem fragments and magic dust.

steps.headline: Be a mentor.
steps.description: The in-game mentorship program gives lots of magic dust rewards. This can be thousands of magic dusts.

steps.headline: Purchase the lucky standard emblem chest every week.
steps.description: This is the most valuable in-game chest because for only 800 BPs, you get 60-210 magic dust. The chest can only be bought 5 times a week so take advantage of the chest every week.

steps.headline: Spin the emblem matrix.
steps.description: The emblem matrix can be spun for free every 42 hours and 30 minutes. You can also spin the matrix if the featured emblem is for the role you want to prioritize because of the double reward every 5x draws.

steps.headline: Spin the lucky spin when it's free.
steps.description: Lucky spin gives small fragment rewards. It is not recommended to spin lucky spin if it costs tickets. It is better to use those for the emblem matrix.

steps.headline: Claim emblem fragments and magic dust from in-game events.
steps.description: MLBB runs lots of events that give fragments and dusts so you can upgrade your emblems fast. Every game rewards users for activity.

steps.headline: Prioritize the emblems for your favorite heroes/roles.
steps.description: Refrain from upgrading the basic physical and magical emblem sets as the stats they give aren't as good as the rest when talking about META.

steps.headline: Recharge on recharge gift events.
steps.description: Recharge gift events give free additional magic dusts upon recharging certain amounts of diamonds.

steps.headline: Buy a monthly starlight pass.
steps.description: The starlight pass gives 100 Magic dusts weekly and lots of tickets that you can use to draw an emblem matrix.

steps.headline: Spin the magic wheel.
steps.description: Magic wheel's lowest tier rewards are fragments and dusts. It is recommended that you spin the wheel with magic potions 5 times a week because the magic wheel is more valuable if spun 5 times a week.
